summary: Prometheus metrics server is broken in v1.9.0-rc.0 when configured with Runtime.install(). Tests are missing to catch this regression.
userImpact: Users cannot use Prometheus metrics collection in v1.9.0-rc.0, breaking observability and monitoring capabilities.
rootCause: Regression introduced between v1.8.6 and v1.9.0-rc.0 in Prometheus server initialization
proposedFix: Add test coverage to verify Prometheus server starts correctly on the configured bind address
keyQuote: A worker started with Runtime.install({ telemetryOptions: { metrics: { prometheus: { bindAddress: '0.0.0.0:9090' } } } }) should bring up a server listening for metrics requests on 9090. This works on v1.8.6 but is broken in v1.9.0-rc.0.
